metadata.title: CVE-2021-36395 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Moodle, the file repository's URL parsing required additional recursionhandling to mitigate the risk of recursion denial of service.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
